dubstep.solution.expr

Class TypeExpression

  • java.lang.Object
    • dubstep.solution.expr.TypeExpression

  • public class TypeExpression
extends java.lang.Object
    Visitor pattern for Expressions that computes the type of an expression. Evaluates types in the context of a Schema.Table that provides type mappings for Column expressions General usage is of the form: new TypeExpression(mySchema).type(myExpression);

      • arith

        public PrimitiveType arith(Expression e)
                    throws java.sql.SQLException
        Compute the type of an arithmetic expression through type escalation
        Parameters:
        e - The expression to compute a type for. Must be a BinaryExpression
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - If the inputs are not valid arithmetic inputs
